target.name: clean-continuous
target.description: Cleans just the continuous build area

target.name: continuous
target.description: Performs a full clean, runs all tests and creates all distribution files
target.depends: clean-continuous, clean, -reset-database, set-build-number, init-test, test, distribute

target.name: continuous-without-tests
target.description: Performs a full clean and creates all distribution files

target.name: distribute
target.description: Creates the distribution files for all platforms
target.depends: set-build-number, incremental, distribute-mmt, distribute-bm-remote, distribute-tomcat, distribute-war, distribute-wcm, distribute-sdk, distribute-webserviceclient, distribute-extensions-office2003, distribute-deployment, distribute-amps, distribute-sample-extensions, distribute-docs, revert-changes

target.name: generate-checksums
target.description: Generates checksum files for the distibution files

target.name: distribute-wcm
target.description: Creates the distibution files for WCM

target.name: distribute-tomcat
target.description: Creates the distibution files for Tomcat

zipfileset.includes: alfresco.bat, alf_start.bat, restart_alf.bat, alf_stop.bat, apply_amps.bat, README_mysql.txt, README.txt

target.name: distribute-war
target.description: Creates the WAR file distribution for all platforms

target.name: distribute-webserviceclient
target.description: Creates the web service client distribution file for all platforms

target.name: distribute-extensions-office2003
target.description: Creates the Office 2003 Extensions distribution files

target.name: distribute-extensions-office2003-word
target.description: Creates the Word 2003 Extensions distribution files

target.name: distribute-extensions-office2003-excel
target.description: Creates the Excel 2003 Extensions distribution files

target.name: distribute-extensions-office2003-powerpoint
target.description: Creates the PowerPoint 2003 Extensions distribution files

target.name: distribute-extensions-office2003-all
target.description: Creates the 3-in-1 Office 2003 Extensions distribution files

target.name: distribute-deployment
target.description: Creates a zip file containing the deployment receiver

target.name: distribute-sample-extensions
target.description: Creates a jar file containing the alfresco sample extensions

target.name: distribute-mmt
target.description: Creates the Alfresco Module Management Tool distribution file for all platforms

target.name: distribute-bm-remote
target.description: Creates the Alfresco Remote Benchmark Tool distribution file for all platforms

target.name: distribute-amps
target.description: Creates the distribution AMP file for all extensions
target.depends: init, package-php-module, package-rm-extension, package-blog-extension, package-fb-doclib-extension, package-googlegadgets

target.name: distribute-sdk
target.description: Creates the sdk distribution file for all platforms

target.name: distribute-docs
target.description: Assembles the documentation from all projects
